name: Cave Alive
description:
Enter Cave Alive! You're stuck inside the cave with no way out and the walls are closing in! Find the Cave's heart and put it down for good! But careful, don't be too greedy when choosing which walls to dig, you might need to change your plans...

This is an updated version for the original entry published for Procjam 2017 (which is still available as a Windows download). This is already greatly improved from that rushed version, but there is still room for improvements! A bespoke soundtrack is also already in the works.

Also added Unix and Osx as supported platforms.

Controls: 

WASD  / Arrow Keys - Move Camera*
Left Mouse Button - Set walls to dig
